entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -36.7°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
